EmailTemplate.name: 2015 Grads - Goldman Sachs & Get Ahead
EmailTemplate.subject: Amazing professional development opportunities for HeadStart Graduates!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Here are some amazing opportunities just for HeadStart Grads! For anyone who started HeadStart in 2015, everything is soon coming to a close!
Some of you have gone through workshops and interviews for your chosen employer earlier in the year, and some are just finishing over the next couple of weeks. No matter where you are in your HeadStart journey, we're so glad that you took part. But more than that, we are so proud of everything you have achieved in 2015!
To celebrate and say a massive "congratulations", we have some incredible opportunities to really help you make the most of all that you have learned while taking part in HeadStart, and help you get ahead no matter what the future holds for you!
We've partnered with Goldman Sachs to bring you an absolutely unmissable professional development opportunity.
Career Skills with Goldman Sachs will give you the opportunity to learn directly from professionals working for one of the world leaders in finance, enhance your employability skills, learn more about your professional goals and make steps toward them. Career Skills with Goldman Sachs will be happening all week from Monday 18th to Friday 22nd July!
South & Central London (https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/headstart-career-skills-session-in-association-with-goldman-sachs-tickets-26337961552) (RSVP here) (https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/headstart-career-skills-session-in-association-with-goldman-sachs-tickets-26337961552) London Southbank University, Elephant & Castle Monday 18th July, Tuesday 19th July & Wednesday 20th July - 1.45pm to 5.30pm
North & Central London (RSVP here) (https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/headstart-career-skills-session-in-association-with-goldman-sachs-tickets-26361854015) The Lift, Islington Thursday 21st July - 9.30am to 1pm
North London (RSVP here) (https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/headstart-career-skills-session-in-association-with-goldman-sachs-tickets-26361904165) Resource for London, Holloway Friday 22nd July - 9.30am to 1pm
Click on the area above to RSVP. Tickets are limited - get in quick!
Please note: As an NCS Graduate, you may have also been invited to other Employability Workshops with Goldman Sachs. These sessions cover different topics, and we definitely recommend attending both!
***
SAVE THE DATE FOR GET AHEAD! There will be more information about Get Ahead sent out in a couple of weeks. But for now, make sure you RSVP below to reserve you place! (https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/get-ahead-for-headstart-grads-tickets-26441946574)
Any questions? Email us at headstart@the-challenge.org
We look forward to seeing you there!
Want to get in on the conversation? Join our brand new national social media channels to see what's going on in HeadStart around the country! https://www.facebook.com/UKHeadStart/?fref=ts https://www.instagram.com/ukheadstart/ https://twitter.com/UKHeadStart http://www.headstart-thechallenge.org/ mailto:headstart@the-challenge.org
